oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Study of Langmuir and Langmuir–Blodgett films of indium arachidate
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DHANABALAN, A
TALWAR, SS
MAJOR, SS
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: fatty acids
langmuir blodgett films
monolayers
multilayers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Langmuir isotherms of a trivalent indium arachidate monolayer and its Langmuir–Blodgett deposition are reported. Transferred multilayers were characterised by Fourier transform infrared and X-ray diffraction measurements. Results indicate that the film consists mainly of arachidate salt in a layered structure.
